name: Kanji Practice
description:
Using only your mouse, master the 20 Kanji by drawing them on the chalkboard and having them critiqued by your Sensei's.

こんにちは、

日本語を勉強 に始めるのために僕のプログラムはとても便利はずです。
僕はプログラムをとても働きました。
プログラムを変えるのが必要だったら、私に連絡してください。

ありがとう~

This program is intended for newer students of the Japanese language.
I worked hard on this program for the Virtual Learning Commons of my College.If you happen to find any bugs, please let me know quickly so that I may fix them.

Thank you

* You may have to allow flashplayer on this webpage to play in browser. I have included a downloadable version for WINDOWS users as well.

Special thanks to,

Etsuko Donnelly

Robert Donnelly

Connor Hyland
